org.robolectric.shadows

Class ShadowMapView

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowView
      • org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowViewGroup
        • org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowMapView

  • Shadow of MapView that simulates the internal state of a MapView. Supports Projections, Overlays, and TouchEvents

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowViewGroup
